resources.string: Your username and / or password are incorrect. If you are sure you have correct details, please contact your system administrator.
Please wait whilst we\'re trying to log you in.
Please wait whilst we\'re trying to get your enrolled courses
Getting the details for your course…
Mobile University uses the Evernote app to create notes. Would you like to install it ?
As Mobile University uses Evernote to keep track of notes, you can only access them if you authenticate Evernote first.
It seems this note is currently empty (or hasn\'t been synchronized yet). Please connect to the internet and restart the application to share this note.
Documents related to the selected course
Synchronize your course deadlines to your calendar ?
This file have not been downloaded yet. Please make sure you have a data connection and try again.
Here you can define your settings for the application.

Thank you for using this application. This project is open source and you can get all of the code @ www.github.com/JoshuaWohle/Moodle-for-Android. If you have any questions, you can send a quick e-mail to jwohle@gmail.com or the.omega.online@gmail.com. If you would like to help us out maintaining / upgrading this app, please do get in touch as well !
The URL of your course schedule application. This is not currently supported.
There was a problem with the URL encoding. Please contact your administrator.
There was a problem with the jason we got back from the server. Please try again.
There was an error trying to read the user file. Please try again or re-install the application.
There was an error saving the user to disk. Please advice the developer (details in settings).
The user class was not found whilst reading from disk. Please contact the developer (details in settings).
Something went wrong with the web service request. Please contact your system administrator.
Information available online about the course content
There was a problem instantiating evernote. Please contact the developer (details in Settings).
